# Animal jokes

Q1. Why was the cow afraid?
A1. He was a cow-herd.

Q2. Why do cows have hooves instead of feet?
A2. Because they lactose.

Q3. What did the buffalo say to his son when he left for college?
A3. “Bison.”

Q4. What do you call a cow with no legs?
A4. ground beef.

Q5. What do you call shaving a crazy sheep?
A5. Shear madness.

Q6. WHat is a Déjà Moo?
A6. The feeling you’ve heard this bull before

Q7. Why can’t humans hear a dog whistle?
A7. Because dogs can’t whistle.

Q8. What do you call a cow with a twitch?
A8. Beef jerky.

Q9. Why do the French eat snails?
Q9. They don’t like fast food.

Q10. Why does a milking stool only have 3 legs?
A10. Because the cow has the udder.

Q11. What do you call 100 rabbits walking backwards?
A11. A receding hare line.

Q12. Where do cows go on holiday?
A12. Moo Zealand.

Q13. What do you call a sheep covered in chocolate?
A13. A candy baa.

Q14. What do you call a cow jumping over barbed wire?
A14. Utter destruction.

Q15. What do you call an alligator with a vest?
A15. An investigator.

Q16. How does a cow become invisible?
A16. Through camooflage.

Q17. What do you call a sleeping bull?
A17. A bull dozer.

Q18. What do you call a cow who plays an instrument?
A18. A moosician.

Q19. Why do cows wear bells?
A19. Because their horns don’t work.

Q20. What is a cow’s favorite party game?
A20. Moo-sical chairs!

Q21. How does a fish always know how much they weigh?
A21. Because they have their own scales.

Q22. What is a cow’s favorite drink?
A22. Mountain Moo!

Q23. What do you call an idiotic cow
A23. A mis-steak!

Q24. Why did the cow cross the road?
A24. To get to the udder side.

Q25. How do cows laugh?
A25. Moo-haha.

Q26. Where did the cat go when it lost it’s tail?
A26. To the retail store!

Q27. What did the mother cow say to the baby cow?
A27. “It’s pasture bed time.”

Q28. How do you count cows?
A28. With a cowculator.

Q29. What do you get when a cow is caught in an earthquake?
A29. You get a milkshake.

Q30. What time is it when a cow sits on your fence?
A30. Time to get a new fence!
